item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald’s Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

DE: [Nom de la victime/témoin-clé/whistleblower’s name, expurgé pour la confidentialité] (Visitez le site X-v-France.com pour plus d’information)

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Notification to McDonald’s executives Gloria Santona, Steve Easterbrook, and Malcolm Hicks
item.description: DE: [Nom de la victime/témoin-clé/whistleblower’s name, expurgé pour la confidentialité] (Visitez le site X-v-France.com pour plus d’information) SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com, Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com, Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com I forgot to mention… As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against “X” (but targeting McDonald’s) for, among other things, defamation. Indeed, it seems some of your executives were behind some defamatory comment against my websites.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald’s Corporation executives “take such inquiries seriously”, McDonald’s Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation Steve Easterbrook. DE: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com OBJET: : update DATE DE RÉCEPTION：2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) À: [Nom de la victime/témoin-clé/whistleblower’s name, expurgé pour la confidentialité] (Visitez le site X-v-France.com pour plus d’information)
